references.reason: This paper introduces the key dataset used to train and evaluate financial reasoning models.

references.paper_title: FinQA: A dataset of numerical reasoning over financial data
references.reason: This paper introduces a critical dataset specifically designed for numerical reasoning in the financial domain.

references.paper_title: ConvFinQA: Exploring the chain of numerical reasoning in conversational finance question answering
references.reason: This paper introduces another crucial dataset that focuses on conversational numerical reasoning in financial contexts.
This paper introduces an important instruction-based dataset used for financial language tasks.

references.paper_title: Deepseek-r1: Incentivizing reasoning capability in llms via reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces DeepSeek-R1, a relevant model as it is the model used as part of the two-stage training framework in the paper.
